name: Abraca-DOG-bra
description:
Story: There once was a dog who dreamt of winning the Dog Beauty Competition, however, after an unfortunate accident, all hope seems lost for the poor dog. Until by pure destiny a witch stumbles upon this Dog and takes on the goal of making sure this dog wins!

Game Info: This game was created similarly to a WarioWare style game, a collection of microgames the player can complete. The microgames are arranged linearly to portray a narrative-based order as it allows the player to follow the story of the Dog and Witch.

Team:

Project Owner - Maddie

Scrum Lord - Jacob

Lead Programmer - Oscar

QA Leader - Marcus

Designers - Harry, Rae, Charan & Kiah

Cutscene Designer - Kosta Papanotas

Music Designers - Oscar Skinner & HoliznaCC0

Facilitators - Rex Smeal & Fae Daunt

Testing: If you would like to provide feedback to help improve the game please use this link!!

https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfC_p28n2Po2EtJXAxlG0cQMtCLk1A6KvVNFLk0...
